ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.messageBody:
> Day of the week to play: Everyday (If husband works, or I can get him
> distracted w/ his hobbies. Love Sat/Sun "Honey, why don't you go play golf
> today?" )
>
> Time of day: Week Evenings, Weekend Days or Days/Eves
>
> Longest stretch of continuous play: I think about 16 hrs, I wasn't counting.
>
> Way to have game sounds: Way down.
>
> Distance to sit from display: 2' leaning into 1'
>
> TV show to have on: Twist Discovery/TLC/Histroy Channel/Home & Garden/Cartoon
> Network (VH1/or what ever hubby is watching as required)
>
> Music to listen to: Twist 500 CD Library - but cheesy 80's (non-glam) metal is
> great for battles
>
> Beverage (non-alcoholic): Coca-cola (again I've lost count)
>
>
>
> Health Food: What sweet wonderful loving Honey makes for dinner.
>
> Junk Food: Parmesan Goldfish.
>
> Clothes to wear: Anything from "female elf outfit" to jeans/t-shirt to towel
> from shower. Never my military uniform!!!!

Rolyes, 15th Bard
Rodcet Nife.
